Lastly, a singular traffic cone is also mentioned as being visible on the right edge of the ego vehicle's lane, reiterating the potential for a hazard or marking the onset of a construction zone. The ego vehicle, therefore, should remain cautious and ready to respond to unexpected changes in road conditions.

This summary encapsulates all the critical elements identified in the traffic scene, focusing on how each affects the driving behavior of the ego vehicle and emphasizing the need for heightened awareness and cautious driving in response to the observed road users and conditions.
